condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National and sub-national government have increased capacities for planning, budgeting, implementing and monitoring integrated quality early childhood development services with a focus on the most vulnerable children

description.narrative: Early childhood development (ECD) has already been established as a core intervention for the country's development and future capabilities under the National Development Plan (NDP), confirming that South Africa will “make ECD a top priority among the measures to improve the quality of education and long-term prospects of future generations”. Evident in a solid policy environment; the Presidential direction that the function of ECD be fully embedded as a sub-sector of the country's education system. Notwithstanding significant progress, quality remains a persistent challenge, largely due to a poorly qualified workforce, lack of appropriate early learning approaches and inadequate resourcing. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of ECD practitioners and Foundation Phase Educators that have engaged in skills development programmes for implementation of the NCF and CAPS through Play Based learning
